languages.text: {n}Маражай растекается в улыбке.{/n} "Один раз ты уже попытал{mf|ся|ась} завести себе зверька — и что из этого вышло? Неужели ты мнишь, что твой воображаемый поводок, не удержавший Ирлиэт, справится со мной?"

{n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай растекается в улыбке.{/n} "Один раз ты уже попытал{mf|ся|ась} завести себе зверька — и что из этого вышло? Неужели ты мнишь, что твой воображаемый поводок, не удержавший Ирлиэт, справится со мной?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te sonríe.{/n} «Ya intentaste adquirir una mascota una vez. ¿Cómo te fue? No esperarás que esa correa imaginaria con la que no pudiste sujetar a Yrliet funcionará conmigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te sonríe.{/n} «Ya intentaste adquirir una mascota una vez. ¿Cómo te fue? No esperarás que esa correa imaginaria con la que no pudiste sujetar a Yrliet funcionará conmigo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的嘴角绽放出笑容。{/n}“你已经养过一只宠物了，可结果呢？你连伊莉耶特都拴不住，你该不会以为你能拴得住我吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的嘴角绽放出笑容。{/n}“你已经养过一只宠物了，可结果呢？你连伊莉耶特都拴不住，你该不会以为你能拴得住我吧？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは口を広げてニヤッと笑う。{/n}「お前は既に一度ペットを手に入れようとしていたが、どうだった？ユリエットちゃんすら捕えられなかった想像上の鎖で、俺を捕えることができるとか思ってないよな？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは口を広げてニヤッと笑う。{/n}「お前は既に一度ペットを手に入れようとしていたが、どうだった？ユリエットちゃんすら捕えられなかった想像上の鎖で、俺を捕えることができるとか思ってないよな？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Vous avez déjà essayé de dresser un animal de compagnie par le passé, et vous avez échoué. Vous ne croyez tout de même pas que votre laisse imaginaire pourrait me retenir alors même qu'elle n'a pas suffi à mater Yrliet ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Vous avez déjà essayé de dresser un animal de compagnie par le passé, et vous avez échoué. Vous ne croyez tout de même pas que votre laisse imaginaire pourrait me retenir alors même qu'elle n'a pas suffi à mater Yrliet ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Ihr habt schon einmal versucht, Euch ein Haustier zu nehmen ... und welchen Erfolg hattet Ihr? Eure imaginäre Leine konnte Yrliet nicht halten. Ihr glaubt doch gewiss nicht, dass sie mich würde halten können?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Ihr habt schon einmal versucht, Euch ein Haustier zu nehmen ... und welchen Erfolg hattet Ihr? Eure imaginäre Leine konnte Yrliet nicht halten. Ihr glaubt doch gewiss nicht, dass sie mich würde halten können?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın sırıtışı tüm yüzüne yayılıyor.{/n} "Önceden evcil hayvanın yok muydu?.. Sonu nasıl oldu? Yrliet'i bile zapt edemeyen o hayalî tasma... Beni ne kadar tutabilecek sence?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a grin.{/n} "You tried to acquire a pet once already — and how did that go? Surely you do not think that your imaginary leash, which failed to restrain Yrliet, would succeed in holding me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın sırıtışı tüm yüzüne yayılıyor.{/n} "Önceden evcil hayvanın yok muydu?.. Sonu nasıl oldu? Yrliet'i bile zapt edemeyen o hayalî tasma... Beni ne kadar tutabilecek sence?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
